issue.title: [Python] Add pandas serialization to the default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1971](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1971). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`pyarrow.register_default_serialization_handlers(context)` does not include pandas serialization. We do not use the default Arrow context, so we are forced to call `_register_pandas_arrow_handlers` to register pandas correctly.
